article_title: Selling Your Business? 3 Ways To Cut The Tax Bite

article_metadata.description: Thinking of selling your business and mad you missed last year’s 15% top capital gains rate? Here are three ways small business owners who are selling out can save taxes.
article_metadata.author: Ashlea Ebeling
